item.title: District 8 (Alive in Joburg)
item.description: So this past weekend I had a chance to see the new movie from director Neil Blomkamp, District 9 . If you haven’t seen District 9 yet, you owe it to yourself to see this movie. The story is great, and the special effects are subtle yet impressive. The director has created a world were the main event is not the Aliens them selfs, but rather their environment & quest to go home.

item.title: I must have died an gone to heaven!
item.description: I cant believe that this isÂ actuallyÂ a reality, but one of my favorite horror movies has been transformed into a Musical! Evil Dead the Musical If your like me then you should have been a fan of Sam Rami’s first movie.Â ScaryÂ & Hilarious at the same time!

item.title: Randomness
item.description: I guess that I’m being a nice guy today. I am giving all the peeps @ work a crack at the new Terminator 3, and other movies that I have downloaded recently. Even though its my effing BANDWITH! Nobody else seems to care, or contribute (i.e.Â download) anything! All exept for T-Dogg! T-Dog’s my Hero! ðŸ˜€ Peace… Love… and Chicken Wings!

item.title: Torrentness
item.description: Ok, going to go to sleep now people! The move that I am downloading, Terminator 3 is at 98% completion. This movie is taking FOREVER to download! ðŸ˜¢ Will have for tomorrow to watch it. Now, if I could only find my damn power adapter for my drill…
